text:
e="preserve">Franck Emmanuel Issoze-Ngondet (2 April 1961 – 11 June 2020) was a Gabonese Democratic politician. He was the 10th Prime Minister of Gabon from 2016 until 2019. In the aftermath of the failed coup d'état attempt, President Ali Bongo Ondimba replaced him with Julien Nkoghe Bekale.
From 2012 to 2016, he was the Minister for Foreign Affairs. He was born in Makokou, Gabon.
Issoze-Ngondet died from asthma on 11 June 2020 in the Gabonese capital of Libreville, aged 59.
